text:
I don't know why but this washing machine takes too much time to wash clothes.
For example i set on a cotton mode wash. It took 1hr 52 minutes.
We buy any machine just to get work done by machine in less than the time we do.
The least time required is 30 minutes.
Also no information is shown on screen that at what spin speed it is going on. And at what temperature it will wash.
Also i faced an issue like dropped clothes in machine and clicked on start button but just after a second i stopped ...
